maqras.text: yeung( a l laoh) sbath nung tikrong nih( tikrong mea kkah)
khn del anak( mou ham meat) chea anak del rsanow knong tikrong nih
haey trong ban sbath nung aupouk mnoussa lok( a da) ning anak del ban kaet( kaunchaw robsa keat)
chea karpit nasa yeung ban bangkeut mnoussa lok aoy sthetnow knong pheap lombak
tae ke kitthea kmean anaknea ach mean anoupheap leu khluon ke te ryy
daoy ke niyeay tha khnhom ban chamnay tropy sa mb tde yeang chraen
tae ke kitthea kmean norna mneak bankheunh ke te ryy
tae yeung minban bangkeut ke aoy mean phnek muoykou
ning andat muoy haeyning bbaurmat te ryy
haey yeung themtang ban changaoulobangheanh meakra pir(la ning akrak) dl ke tiet phng
te ke minban daer now leu meakra del lombak( meakra tow kan pheap chokchy) laey
tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha meakra del lombak chea avei noh
ku kar daohleng khnhom bamreu dachthlai aoy mean setthi seripheap
ryy phdal chamneiahar nowknong thngai muoy del mean kroh tourphiksa
(ryy phdal chamneiahar dl) kaunkamprea del chea nheatesandean
ryy anak kreikr del kmeanoavei saoh
banteabmk ke ban klaycha mnoussa mneak knongchamnaom anak del mean chomnue ning ban phdephdam knea aoy meankar atthmot haeyning ban phdephdam knea aoy mean kdei me tda krounea
anak teangnoh kuchea krom del ttuol banhchi daoy daisdam
haey puok del kmean chomnue nung ayeat robsa yeung puok ke kuchea puok del ttuol banhchi daoy dai che v ng
phleung nork krobadandab leu puokke yeang chit
a l laoh sbath nung preahatity ning rosmei da trachahtrachng robsa vea now pelopruk
ning preah chnt nowpel del vea ban reah laeng banteabpi preahatity lich
ning pelothngai nowpel del preahatity ban b po ch nh ponlu
ning peloyb nowpel del vea ban krobadandab preahatity
ning mekh ning anak del ban bangkeut vea
ning phendei ning anak del ban leat sa nu th ng vea
ning roubreang( a da) ning anak del ban thveu aoy ke mean lokkhan samoromy
ruochamk trong ban changaoulobangheanh dl ke aoy skal nouv ampeutouchcharit ning ampeu so chch ri t robsa ke
anak del saamatakhluon ke( daoy sang ampeula) pitchea ttuol ban chokchy
haey anak del ban thveu aoy khluon ke kakhvak( daoy sang ampeu akrak) pitchea ban khatabng
krom sa mou d ban bdeseth( anakneasar robsa puokke)daoy sar karbampean robsa puokke
nowpel del chn kamnach bamphot knongchamnaom puokke ban chenh mk( samleabsatv audth nhi)
pelnoh anakneasar robsa a l laoh( sa leh)ban pol towkean puokke tha ( chaur brongobraytn champoh) satv audth nhi robsa a l laoh haey kom reareang dl kar phoek robsa vea aoy saoh

te puokke ban bdeseth nung keat ning ban samleab vea . pel noh mcheasa robsa puokke ban bamphlanh puokke daoysaarte babakamm robsa puokke . haey trong ban theu v aoy puokke vineasa a nd reay teangoasaknea
haey trong min khlach lotthophl chongokraoy robsa puokke ( del trong ban daktondakamm leu puokke) noh laey
a l laoh sbath nung peloyb nowpel del vea krobadandab daoy pheap ngngut
ning pelothngai pel del vea ban b po ch nh ponlu da trachahtrachng
ning anak del ban bangkeut aoy mean brosa ning srei
pitabrakd nasa kar broengobreng robsa puok anak(nowknong lokey) ku khosa knea
chamnek e anaknea del ban brichcheaktean ning kaotakhlach a l laoh
haeyning mean chomnue leu kar tabasnang la noh
yeung nung riebcham aoy ke nouv meakra del ngeayosruol
rie anaknea haey del kamnanh ning min trauvkar chomnuoy pi a l laoh
haeyning ban bdeseth nung kar tabasnang la noh
yeung nung riebcham aoy ke nouv meakra del lombak
haey tropy sa mb tde robsa ke min phdal phalobrayoch dl ke laey nowpel delke ban thleak chaul tow knong nork haey noh
pitabrakd nasa phearkechch robsa yeung ku phdal kar changaoulobangheanh
haey pitabrakd nasa thngai avsan nei lokey ning thngai dambaung nei lokey kuchea kammosetthi robsa yeung
dau che neah yeung ban dasatuen promean puok anak ampi phleung nork del cheh santhosanthow
del kmean anaknea chaul tow knong noh krawpi chn touchcharit
delke ban bdeseth( nung anakneasar) ning ban berchenh ( pi chomnue leu a l laoh) noh laey
haey ke nung banhchiesa anak del kaotakhlach a l laoh ampi vea( nork)
del brichcheak tropy sa mb tde robsa ke daembi saamatakhluon
haey ke min trauvkar kar tabasnang nie k meat pi anaknea mneak laey
leuklengte daembi svengork kar ylprom pi mcheasa robsa ke da mha utdongk utdam bonnaoh
haey ke pitchea nung penh chetd cheaminkhan( avei del yeung tabasnang dl ke)
a l laoh sbath nung pelopruk
ning peloyb nowpel del vea ngngut
mcheasa robsa anak( ao mou ham meat) minban baohbng anak ning minban saabkhpaem anak laey
chea karpit nasa thngai barlok brasaer samreab anak cheang lokey nih towtiet
haey mcheasa robsa anak pitchea nung bratan( nie k meat)aoy anak . haey anak brakadchea nung penh chetd cheaminkhan
tae trong min bankheunh anak( mou ham meat) chea kaunkamprea ning ban theroksaa anak te ryy
haey trong bankheunh anak v nge vng ruoch trong ban changaoulobangheanh phlauv dl anak te ryy
haey trong bankheunh anakchea anakakr ruoch trong ban thveu aoy anak mean ban te ryy
dau che neah chaur anak kom kiebasangkot champoh kaunkamprea aoy saoh
haey chaur anak kom koumhk champoh anaksomtean aoy saoh
rie nie k meat del mcheasa robsa anak ban bratan aoy noh chaur anak riebreab( doengkoun)
